detail_desc: Trousers in soft, patterned jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated waist, decorative drawstring and narrow frill trim at the top. Pockets in the side seams and one back pocket.

Set with a long-sleeved top, pair of leggings, dungaree dress and hairband in soft jersey. Top with an all-over print and concealed press-stud on one shoulder. Leggings with an elasticated waist. Dress with straps that have a decorative tie detail at the front and press-studs at the back, and patch pockets. Hairband with a twisted detail.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in woven fabric with an elasticated waist. Lined.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in woven fabric with an elasticated waist. Lined.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with elastication at the top and narrow shoulder straps with a decorative bow on the shoulders. Gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt.
Imitation suede mules with open toes and covered block heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Imitation suede mules with open toes and covered block heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Body in jersey with a yoke and sleeves in mesh. Opening at the top and press-studs at the crotch.
Imitation suede sandals with a braided foot strap and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Imitation suede sandals with a braided foot strap and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Imitation suede sandals with a braided foot strap and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Sandals with narrow straps, covered block heels and elasticated ankle straps. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 5.5 cm.

Court shoes in imitation leather with pointed toes, satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Covered block heels 6 cm.
Gently flared blouse in airy cotton twill with a square-shaped neckline and gathers at the top. Long balloon sleeves with embroidery and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Straight-cut hem.
Sandals with elasticated heel straps and cork wedge heels. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Platform front 1.5 cm, heel 10.5 cm.
Sandals with elasticated heel straps and cork wedge heels. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Platform front 1.5 cm, heel 10.5 cm.

Sandals in imitation suede with covered heels. Wide elastic straps at the top, a foot strap at the front and a zip in the heels. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 2 cm, heel 11 cm.

Sandals in imitation suede with covered heels. Wide elastic straps at the top, a foot strap at the front and a zip in the heels. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 2 cm, heel 11 cm.
Open-toed court shoes in imitation suede made partly from recycled polyester with open sides and slim, covered heels. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.

Open-toed court shoes in imitation suede made partly from recycled polyester with open sides and slim, covered heels. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Sandals with cork wedge heels and heel straps that are elasticated at the back. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Platform front 3.5 cm, heel 11 cm.

V-neck jumper in a soft cable knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Long earrings in metal and plastic. Length 9 cm.

Hat in braided paper straw containing glittery threads with a corded band with a metal decoration and a frayed edge around the brim. Width of brim 9 cm.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck front and back with a flounce, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a sewn-in wrapover at the front and a concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist and straight legs.

Fully lined bikini. Top with glittery, elastic shoulder straps, a small metal decoration at one side, glittery elastication at the top and several tiers of flounces. Bottoms with glittery elastic and a flounce at the top.

Baby Exclusive. Dress in soft slub cotton jersey with woven flounces and a woven section with broderie anglaise on the front. Small opening and button at the back of the neck and a flounce at the hem.
Bikini. Top with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and a flounce at the top that continues along the shoulder straps. Lined front. Bottoms with a flounce at the top and lined gusset.
Padded jacket with a padded hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with inner ribbing at the cuffs, welt side pockets and a drawstring at the hem.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button, and tapered legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.

Mules in imitation suede with a braided trim around the soles and wide foot strap with concealed elastic at the side. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 3 cm, heel 6.5 cm.
Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with an adjustable shoulder strap and an imitation suede flap with a press-stud. Two inner compartments. Lined. Size 8x15x20 cm.

Dungarees in an organic cotton weave with a chest pocket, straps with adjustable fasteners, and a back pocket. Press-studs at the sides, a seam and belt loops at the waist, and concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs.
